title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, …) with a single CLI and optional REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured web UI (chat, multi-user, model manager, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, pull, list, delete, show.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Community Go CLI wrapper with interactive REPL, prompt templates, config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration for Ollama chat & embedding generators.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, streaming, embeddings, list/pull.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM & embedding connectors for Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper that adds JWT auth & rate-limiting in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client for Ollama chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from notes.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift menu-bar app for macOS to start/stop Ollama and switch models.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model; group & private chats.
